improvements.reason: Added requirements traceability matrix, detailed validation rules for all data models, and acceptance criteria for each component
Added complete state machine diagram with valid transitions, agent interaction sequence diagram, detailed component interfaces with method signatures, retry/backoff logic, and file locking strategy
Added complete CLI command documentation with options, arguments, exit codes, example invocations, and both success/error output formats

Added comprehensive risk analysis table with severity/likelihood/impact/mitigation, detailed mitigation implementations for state corruption and cost limits, approval audit logging, and complete testing strategy with unit/integration/e2e test cases

remaining_issues.description: Architecture diagrams are text-based ASCII; could benefit from actual diagram files
No explicit API versioning strategy for future state schema changes beyond basic migration
